techmeme.title: Austin-based Command Zero, which uses automation and LLMs to help with cybersecurity investigations, emerges from stealth with $21M in seed funding led by a16z (Ionut Arghire/SecurityWeek)
Volley, which makes AI-powered games played via voice commands on Amazon Alexa, Fire TV, and Roku TV, raised a $55M Series C to bring its total funding to $75M+ (Stephanie Palazzolo/The Information)
Despite OpenAI's move to shut out Chinese developers from its tech, OpenAI's models are still available in China via Microsoft's Azure China (The Information)
The FTC bans teen messaging app NGL from serving users under 18, a first; NGL agreed to pay $5M and stop marketing to kids and teens to settle the FTC lawsuit (Cristiano Lima-Strong/Washington Post)
NFT and metaverse content creation company Infinite Reality raised $350M at a $5.1B valuation and acquires Roblox game developer Landvault for $450M in stock (Dean Takahashi/VentureBeat)
